body:
running linux mint, the default fonts are larger and wider than on windows.
linux fonts seem to be pretty crap in general TBH (same issue with zorin) - whether it is because it is running in virtual box, I am not sure. Shame really, I could develop in linux if it didn't do my eyes in!

- Avatar images are not sorted correctly (see issue 683 ).
- About dialog text overlaps each other and falls off edge of dialog.
- Download images dialog need to be a bit wider.
- SliderPanel does not resize well which linux exacerbates.
- AI properties dialog components falling off the edge.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: linux UI layout issues

comments.body: Also not sure if this is VBox-related but when I click on the options icon on the duel game screen the options overlay is shown but it flickers on/off. If I hit the Escape key it is fine. Very strange.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
